title: Experimental design - organic waste effect on DO

content.prompt: What is the main purpose for the experiment?

choices.label: To determine how much O2 the algae can produce
To show how much CO2 is consumed by decomposition
To collect data to determine how waste in water can be useful
To demonstrate that initial DO is not important
To observe the effect of organic waste on DO

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify a testable hypothesis or scientific question for an investigation.
